Interface Account


  • public interface Account
    Created by robert on 3/10/2015.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Account applyForNewAccount(Customer customer, double openingBalance, java.lang.Integer accountNumber)
      Applies for a new account using the customer's information and the customer's proposed opening balance to decide whether or not they qualify for the account.
      boolean checkWithdrawLimits(double withdrawal)
      This method is used when a withdraw is attempted and will verify that the customer is allowed to make a withdrawal and that the account is in such a state.
      double deposit(double amount)
      Deposits a given amount into the account and returns the value deposited.

    • Method Detail

      • getBalance

        double getBalance()
        Returns the balance of the account.
        Returns:
        returns the balance of the account

      • getType

        java.lang.String getType()
        Returns the String representation of the Account Type (i.e. Savings, Checking, etc.)
        Returns:
        returns the type of the account as a String.

      • getMinRequiredBalance

        double getMinRequiredBalance()
        Obtains the minimum balance required to open the account
        Returns:
        returns the minimum balance required to open the account.

      • deposit

        double deposit(double amount)
        Deposits a given amount into the account and returns the value deposited.
        Parameters:
        amount - amount of money to deposit
        Returns:
        returns the amount deposited into the account for confirmation.

      • withdraw

        double withdraw(double amount)
        adds a given amount to the account's balance.
        Parameters:
        amount - amount to be withdrawn
        Returns:
        returns the amount withdrawn from the account for confirmation

      • getACCOUNT_NUMBER

        java.lang.Integer getACCOUNT_NUMBER()
        returns the Account's integer account number. This value is also the key associated with the account's position in the hashtable
        Returns:
        returns the account nuber associated with the account.

      • checkWithdrawLimits

        boolean checkWithdrawLimits(double withdrawal)
        This method is used when a withdraw is attempted and will verify that the customer is allowed to make a withdrawal and that the account is in such a state.
        Parameters:
        withdrawal - amount to be withdrawn
        Returns:
        returns true if withdraw allowed, returns false otherwise.

      • applyForNewAccount

        Account applyForNewAccount(Customer customer,
                           double openingBalance,
                           java.lang.Integer accountNumber)
        Applies for a new account using the customer's information and the customer's proposed opening balance to decide whether or not they qualify for the account.
        Parameters:
        customer - customer examined for qualification. The account factory obtains the information it needs from the customer object passed through the params.
        openingBalance - proposed opening balance to open the account with.
        accountNumber - account number of the new account
        Returns:
        will return the newly created account if the customer qualified, else null is returned.

      • getOwner

        java.util.UUID getOwner()
        returns the UUID object of the owner of the account
        Returns:
        returns the UUID object of the owner of the account.
